content: So some of His disciples said to one another, “What is this that He is telling us, ; and, ?”
So they were saying, “What is this that He says, ? We do not know what He is talking .”
Jesus knew that they wanted to question Him, and He said to them,
His disciples *said, “See, now You are speaking plainly and are not using any figure of speech.
Now we know that You know all things, and  You have no need for anyone to question You; this is why we believe that You came forth from God.”
